Reviews.Title: “Average hotel, no Five Star”
Reviews.Author: Reis2012
Reviews.Content: middle 9night family trip compelled post opinions site apartment sized living nice kitchen bedroom staff nice dont effort accommodate clean kept paying moderate price 2 adults 1 child child sleep uncomfortable coach cushions otherwise charged aed usd 200 extra mattress youll usually 5 star im disappointed dvd player barely functions image missing blue color remote precarious youre staying single bedroom unit dont expect view units buildings close proximity pool nice gym basic average hotel five star

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful large apartments in excellent location!”
Reviews.Author: paulas1972
Reviews.Content: apartments recommended friend travels dubai frequently werent disappointed 1 bedroom apartment huge queensize bed 2 bathrooms 2 showers sinks kitchen staff friendly accomodating pool lovely views burj al arab apartments located mall emirates metro perfect exploring definately visit

Reviews.Title: “what a nice appartment !!!”
Reviews.Author: R M
Reviews.Content: stayed partner 8 nights excecutive suite meters appartment superb vey comfortable bedroom clothes storage desk flat screen tv nice decorative bed wc bathroom bathtub shower kitchen living dining screen flat tv totaly imagine vey clean helpfull reception staff easily found taxi 5 min walking metro station 5 min mall emirates shopping mall carefour super market restaurants mini markets buy restaurant hotel 24 hours breakfast dining didnt swimming pool roof top ok spend hours therethe complain difficulty spa personel towel bathroom towels pool free internet acces noise outside cousin appartment jealous instead 4star hotel burj khalifa foolish am past trips dubai didnt stayed 4star expensive hotel course prefer stay coral boutique al barsha

Reviews.Content: booked below standard hotel husbands paying left check 60s 70s drab decor yellow orange sofas dirty marks walls handprints walls patio doors filthy dust skirting boards thick balcony unusable due build dirt cleaned 3 weeks housekeeping dont clean tables dont dust tables skirting boards dont leave toilet paper 1 roll 3 bathrooms replenish toiletries towel soap guest bathroom hello hygene kitchen tap swivels chain plug 5 broken nails kitchen equipment 4 people consisted 1 fork 3 knives 3 mugs 3 glasses ironing board sits slant falls careful washing machine italian english instructions little utensils spoon pool nice loungers dirty dirty marks 2 weeks staff pleasant contact unfortunately furniture stay car boxed furniture basement toxic varnish fumes week breakfast limited latte costs extra recommend nicer hotel apartments al barsha

Reviews.Title: “great value good location for beach metro and retail therapy”
Reviews.Author: safarijkts
Reviews.Content: stayed executive bedroom suite appt 204 largest dubai price balcony view building ongoing plot dubai remember stay hotel admire view loungedining equipped kitchen size bed bathroom bath separate shower free internet pleasant surprise flat screen tv plus dvd player lounge sat package decently equipped gym spa roof top pool standard hotel apartments service despite poor reviews elsewhere taxis available outside mall emirates metro station range restaurants supermarkets exist close essentials contrary reviews found ac adjustable adequate deal 35 centigrade try option breakfast overpriced stayed hotel apartments dubai represent value field arrangement access hotels beach hotel close numerous beach front hotels offer day passes le meridien hotel beach five ten minutes taxi found beach adequate

Reviews.Title: “Great Service - Good location - Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: DisneyDenmark
Reviews.Content: maybe 5 star hotelapartment fine 4 star staff provided 5 star service especially ahmed ali andrew apartment location 300 meters metrostation sharaf dg 500 meters emirates mall entrance kempinski hotel 100 meters supermarket restaurants

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Location”
Reviews.Author: chinagirl033
Reviews.Content: stayed christmas location 5 mins walk mall emirates 5 mins nearest metro station runs 4 mins shop road called run friendly couple selling fresh fruit veg bread cheeses etc ideal staying self catering apartment subway sandwich shop road corner street holiday inn sports bar etc restaurants apartments equiped cooker microwave washing machine etc clean downside apartment hotel dark building khalifa tower book days advance

Reviews.Title: “The worst service I have ever encountered...EVER!!!”
Reviews.Author: DubaiManofmystery
Reviews.Content: decided stay days eid break booked booking website accommodates fine family 2 adults 12 arrived 1 king bed lingering stench cigarette smoke dirty grubby furniture argued duty manager 1 112 hours bed issue despite repeated admissions website misleading information booked wrong provided hoteland additional beds refused provide extra beds additional cost absolutely gobsmacked attitude duty front manager risk formal complaints upper management legal action provide portable bed children free charge despite agreeing reasonable assume frequent international travelers astonished disregard providing customer service meeting hotels obligation aside issue stated smelly stale cigarette smoke children slept floor avoid hotel costs
